questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Fence and banner attached to it and a sports court behind

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) At a sports facility

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A piece of art
C) A sports court and a fence
D) A landscape

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A large letter on a banner
D) A building

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees and sky
B) A beach
C) A sports court
D) A cityscape

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) A fence with a banner
D) A sidewalk

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The banner is hanging on the fence, which surrounds the sports court.
B) The person is standing next to a tree.
C) The landscape is visible behind the art piece.
D) The building is in front of the cityscape.

What material is the fence made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

What color is the banner in the photo?
A) Red and white
B) Blue and yellow
C) Orange and blue
D) Green and white

What is the texture of the surface beneath the fence?
A) Grass
B) Concrete
C) Sand
D) Wood

What is the size of the letters on the banner?
A) Small
B) Medium
C) Large
D) Tiny

What is the primary color of the sports court?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Yellow

Are there any people visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the surface of the sports court made of?
A) Grass
B) Clay
C) Hard court
D) Carpet

What is the shape of the letters on the banner?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Rectangular/square
D) Triangular

What is the pattern of the fence?
A) Horizontal lines
B) Vertical lines
C) Diamond-shaped mesh
D) Circular holes

What is the condition of the banner on the fence?
A) Torn and old
B) New and intact
C) Faded and worn out
D) Unclear

What is the texture of the banner?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Matte

What is the pattern on the banner?
A) Stripes
B) Solid color
C) Letters and shapes
D) Polka dots

How many letters are visible on the banner?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the condition of the ground beneath the fence?
A) Wet and muddy
B) Dry and clean
C) Covered in debris
D) Snowy

What is the visibility of the sports court lines?
A) Clear and visible
B) Faint and hard to see
C) Not visible
D) Covered

What type of fence is shown in the photo?
A) Chain-link fence
B) Wooden fence
C) Barbed wire fence
D) Glass fence

What is the style of the letters on the banner?
A) Cursive
B) Bold and blocky
C) Italic
D) Handwritten

How is the banner attached to the fence?
A) Tied with ropes
B) Attached with hooks and  Nailed to the fence
C) Nailed to the fence
D) Glued to the fence

What is the color of the lines on the sports court?
A) White
B) Yellow
C) Red
D) Green

What is the angle of the shadow cast on the ground?
A) Short and direct
B) Long and angled
C) Faint and scattered
D) No shadow visible
